main event: S/Sgt George Pierce observed an unidentified object in the sky while walking near his mother's residence in Brooklyn, NY on 23 February 1956.
interesting points: The object appeared to be wobbling or fluttering in the air,The object was described as being much larger than a conventional aircraft,The sighting took place around 2000 hours,There were no other witnesses reported to the sighting,The investigation concluded it was probably a misinterpretation of conventional aircraft.
sighted object: Unidentified flying object, possibly sphere or globe-shaped
witness description: S/Sgt George Pierce, a member of the U.S. Army
